# Announcements Category

**Purpose:** Official project updates, milestone announcements, and important news.

**Guidelines:**
- Only maintainers post here
- Keep announcements factual and concise
- Include relevant links to documentation
- Tag major versions (v1.0, v2.0, etc.)

**Examples of appropriate posts:**
- "PhoenixPME v1.0 testnet launched"
- "Security audit results published"
- "DAO vote results announced"
- "Monthly development update"
